title: Flipped Learning-Based Logistics System Simulation Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational logistics management concepts and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Blended education program focused on practical skills for adult learners in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to utilize the basic functions of logistics simulation software with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can design and execute simulation models for optimizing logistics processes.
Learners enhance their ability to analyze simulation results through peer assessment in team-based activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
